storyInfo:
The L.G.D. receives some help from a mysterious official and are granted a moment's respite.
Elsewhere, a mysterious figure clad in black is also making its move, leaving no survivors.

attributes.content: Hurry! Get back! The Infected have turned into monsters!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Agh! I've been bit! I've been bit!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: What has that nasty little boy done?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Doctor, we need to move! We have to meet up with Amiya!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: A small fire team can't handle a herd of this size. We have to tread carefully!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: There's nothing we can do for the L. G. D. now. We're in a much worse position than them.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Set them aside. My top priority is to guarantee your safety.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We're dead if we don't retreat!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: The cavalry is here. Stand firm.
Form two teams and move on their flanks.
Trust me. While I cannot take action myself, this method will succeed.
Execute a pincer attack, hold the enemy in place, and leave the stragglers to your reinforcements.
If you hadn't come to help...
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: We can't hold here. We have to find a way out...
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Of course! The high ground! We move up the stairs and attack down into the corridor!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: ...No. All we can do is hold. But at least we won't get cornered by this crowd of lunatics!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Right. Come about, gather up at each doorway, pull back the teams, and take a defensive formation! Hurry! Move!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: I will move on the ground.
All we have is piercing weapons, and they're useless against these things!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: We're the last line of defense for the civilians behind us!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Captain

attributes.content: We fight to the last man!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Captain

attributes.content: Watch the Originium they're throwing. It corrodes your equipment, and some of them explode!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Captain

attributes.content: Ah Chung, get back! You, move up! Don't let them through!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Captain

attributes.content: Aaaaaagh! Th- they got me! They're eating me! Noo! Aaaaieeeee!!!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: H- how... you wiped them all out in one bright flash?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Captain

attributes.content: I just said I would not act. Little did I know how incapable you are of protecting the masses.
That I would be forced to take such action, it's humiliating!
Madam nothing! Were you not told to ignore my presence?
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: I found your spirit laudable. How disappointing it was to see you hopping about aimlessly, leaving me to do your work. Honestly, what were you doing?
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Chop chop! How have you not learned to move with haste even after witnessing me?
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Oh, but of course. You did not witness me. I did nothing. Is that clear?
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: But if a single hair on the head of a single commoner comes to harm, you are all terminated. Even I must resign. We are all unemployed.
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Y- yes, of course... We'll fight with all our strength.
attributes.name: L. G. D. Captain

attributes.content: Very good. Now why are you just standing there? Move!
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: By the way...? Do you know those Black Cloaks?
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Get your eyes checked! Those people on the rooftops, wearing the billowing black cloaks.
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Apologies, Madam. What are you talking about?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Captain

attributes.content: Recon team, fall back! Hold firing position!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Are these Infected mutants messing with the radio waves? Our scouts could be in trouble.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We can't hold them...! There's so many! Didn't you cut through a whole wave of these things back there? Why haven't you done that already?!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hah. Leave it to this puk gaai Lung to be so useless right when we need her most!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Then why don't you show us what you can do!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: SUPERINTENDENT CH'EN SAYS: RECON TEAM! FALL BACK! HOLD FIRING POSITION!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I said how was that?! Fire team, loose explosive bolts!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Am I deaf now thanks to you?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Go. Use your talents to get the word out to the communications team at Originium Transciever Beta. Have them tell everyone: the herd is tough, hold your positions, minimize casualties, don't conserve firepower.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Already? They took the chance to infiltrate our unit, huh.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I guess it's to be expected. They were never going to give us free rein.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Anyway, it doesn't change our plans. Let them see how strong Lungmen is.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: One more thing. I... I'm not sure how accurate the reports are.
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Some units have reported sightings of individuals wearing black raincoats.
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Thankfully no. We've seen evidence of them clashing with Reunion. And...
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: And... the Reunion they clashed with all seem to have died in, how can I describe it...?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Sounds like an urban legend. You've got shadowy figures running around Lungmen in black raincoats on a bright, sunny day? Somebody needs help...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: W- why! Why are you hurting your people? Snap out of it!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Get out of here! Don't let them get you! Run!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Infected fugitive group on the border of Sectors 13 and 6. 44 individuals.
